title: Stainless appliances, Pantry, 9 ft ceilings
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 687 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Find the perfect blend of beauty and balance, form and function, work and play at the Cielo, DTC's newest urban apartments in the heart of southeast Denver.", 'With our central location, you are just minutes from fine dining, shopping, recreation, and within walking distance to the Belleview light rail station.', 'This luxurious community features a high-tech fitness center with TVs, clubroom with kitchen, Wi-fi cafe with java bar, plasma TV and DVD player.', 'An opulent swimming pool with spa with Wi-fi service and an outdoor fireplace lounge with BBQ grills for your leisure.', 'Interior finishes include exotic granite countertops, full size washers and dryers with electric fireplaces in select floor plans.', 'Each home includes a natural, light maple hard-wood style flooring in kitchens and entries, with custom-designed espresso finish cabinetry, clean and black steel energy efficient appliances, electric ranges, built-in microwaves and dishwashers, nine foot ceilings with crown molding and modern track lighting, earth- toned accent walls and oversized walk-in closets.', 'Center yourself at Cielo.', 'Features:', 'Custom cabinetry, Linen closets, Private balcony, Microwave, Ice maker, Electric fireplace, Walk in closets, Pantry, Central heat, City and mountain/greenspace views, Vinyl plank flooring, Energy Star appliances, Private patio, Large closets, Granite countertops, In-unit washer and dryer, Soaking tub, Breakfast bar, 9 ft ceilings, Dishwasher, Ceiling fans, Stainless appliances, Key fob entry, Central air conditioning, Separate dining area, Garbage disposal, Open layout', 'Community Amenities:', 'BBQ area, Cyber Café, Accepts cats, Accepts dogs, Towel service, Reserved Parking, Near public transportation, shopping and entertainment, Outdoor Pool, Garage parking, Complimentary Wi-Fi, 24 hour fitness center, Conference room, Business center, Cardio Equipment, Hot Tub, Clubhouse, Close to I-25, Bellview and I-225', 'Pet Policy', 'Cielo welcomes your pet!', 'We are a pet friendly community offering plenty of space for your pet to run and play.', 'Our apartments accommodate up to two pets per home.', 'Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.', 'Your pets will love it here!', 'Interested in more information?',
